_sText:
===================================================================================
===================================================================================
DE_TURK: BY RYAN JONES  (SUPER PIE)
===================================================================================
===================================================================================

===================================================================================
Map Information:
===================================================================================

Title:
de_turk

Date:
August 19, 2010

Authors:
Ryan Jones "Super Pie"

Version:
1.0

Email:
legendarysuperpie [at] gmail.com (Ryan Jones)

Website:
tankdragon.blogspot.com

Description:
It is a defusion bay map with some buildings. Pathways with objects to hide 
behind. Some reasonable sniping points. Orange. :)

Story:
Terrorists are trying to settle the score with "Big Money" of the area. They plan 
to bomb at least one of their two buildings. Destroying either of these buildings 
will greatly cripple them financially. "Big Money" found out about the Terrorists' 
plan and setup some security in the area. The Terrorists grouped up and prepared 
for their assault. This is where your choices make the difference. Will the 
Terrorists succeed or fail?

Side note:
This is my first map. Finally, after years, I finally completed a map for 
CS: Source! :D

===================================================================================
Installation:
===================================================================================

Just place the *.bsp file into your 
"$SteamUserDir\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps\" directory and go have some 
fun! :)

===================================================================================
Special Thanks to:
===================================================================================

3kliksphilip for the tutorials on his website/youtube.
rocketrascal34 (TopHATTwaffle) for the tutorials on his website/youtube.
...and to all the other random tutorials I have found over the web.
...and all the authors to the programs to make these maps possible [with ease].

...and you for downloading this map! :D

===================================================================================
Easter Egg(s):
===================================================================================

There is 1 turtle in this level.

===================================================================================
Problems?:
===================================================================================

If you see any problems with the map, either visually or with the gameplay, LET ME 
KNOW!

I plan on taking the information from people to make better maps for the 
community. :)

===================================================================================
Copyright:
===================================================================================

de_turk Â© Ryan Jones "Super Pie" 2010
